original: 陳郡陽夏人，歷仕魏晉兩朝。以豪富聞名，「食日萬錢，猶曰無下箸者」。雖如此，但不縱情聲色，為官大體上無甚過失，亦無高功。另，何曾參與賈充的朋黨之爭，時人多有非議。
text: A native of Yangxia, Chen Jun, who served in the Wei and Jin dynasties. He is famous for being rich and wealthy. Even so, but not indulging in sensuality, being an official generally has no fault or high merit. In addition, there was a lot of criticism about how he ever participated in Jia Chong's crony dispute.
